title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)
overview: A demanding 136-credit program that builds strong foundations in algorithms, systems, AI, and software engineering.
highlights: Opportunities in AI, cybersecurity, robotics, data science
structure: Program core and electives spanning programming, data structures, algorithms, systems, databases, networks, AI and advanced topics.

contact.department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering

detailed_description: With this degree, students will establish a strong foundation in fundamental computer science ideas, studying everything from network design and operating systems to programming design, data structures, and algorithms, as well as creating the future-defining technologies. The CSE graduates will possess essential skills required for computing careers, master theoretical ideas, and develop practical skills for industry and research.
